Parameters: int: The id of the camera
getJpegEncodingQualityParameter(int, int.Description: Returns a pre-defined still image capture (jpeg) quality level used for the given quality level in the Camera application for the specified camera.
getJpegEncodingQualityParameter(int, int.FullName: public static int getJpegEncodingQualityParameter (int cameraId, int quality)

getJpegEncodingQualityParameter(int).Description: Returns a pre-defined still image capture (jpeg) quality level used for the given quality level in the Camera application for the first back-facing camera on the device. If the device has no back-facing camera, this returns 0.

Parameters: int: The id of the camera
getJpegEncodingQualityParameter(int,int).Description: Returns a pre-defined still image capture (jpeg) quality level used for the given quality level in the Camera application for the specified camera.
getJpegEncodingQualityParameter(int,int).FullName: public static int getJpegEncodingQualityParameter (int cameraId, int quality)

ClassDesc: The CameraProfile class is used to retrieve the pre-defined still image capture (jpeg) quality levels (0-100) used for low, medium, and high quality settings in the Camera application.
